CommentBody:
Sent a mock job to look a the SA_JobTaskStatsTbl

Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Administration > Reporting > Report Configuration Wizard > E-mail Page
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Report/Wizard/Email.htm 

As well as the Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Administration > Jobs Tree > Instant Job Wizard > SAS_ExecutionStatistics Job
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Jobs/InstantJobs/SAS_ExecutionStatistics.htm

Built a Job_Issues_report job that only has a report looking at the SA_JobTaskStatsTbl

I have the report set to list only jobs with errors that ended yesterday.
Example: https://nwxcorp.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068Qk00000ECtzx?asPdf=false&operationContext=CHATTER

For an individual report best option would be Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Administration > Reporting > Report Configuration Wizard > E-mail Page
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Report/Wizard/Email.htm
Example image: https://nwxcorp.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068Qk00000EWiDz?asPdf=false&operationContext=CHATTER
